7.ara-name: كتاب الزكاة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Amr bin Shu'aib narrated from his father, from his grandfather that :the Prophet addressed the people and said: "As for one who is the guardian of an orphan who has wealth, then let him do business with it and not leave it until it becomes consumed by charity

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي زَكَاةِ مَالِ الْيَتِيمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Zakat On The Orphan's Wealth
